definition: ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements

sentences.english: The fire flamed out as soon as oil was poured on it.
sentences.chinese: 油一倒在火上，立刻就腾起了熊熊烈焰。

sentences.english: Flame Prison is an elementalist off-hand dagger skill.
sentences.chinese: 烈焰牢狱是元素使副手匕首技能。

sentences.english: The personal history of the artist, like his work, has passed through the fire step-by-step.
sentences.chinese: 孙超的艺术与生命历程，都是一脚一步走过烈焰。

sentences.english: Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of Shyvana.
sentences.chinese: 处于龙族形态下，烈焰吐息将变为锥形的范围法术。

sentences.english: The smoke billowed from the burning house.
sentences.chinese: 浓烟从烈焰飞腾的房子里滚滚喷出。

sentences.english: The smolder will soon be a flame.
Hubbard called this level the Wall of Fire.
sentences.chinese: 哈伯德把这一等级叫做烈焰之墙。

sentences.english: FLAMES ROAR through the base of Hometree.
sentences.chinese: 咆哮的烈焰从家园树的底部窜出。

sentences.english: However, Gallade unleashes a Feint, and in one hit faints the fire horse.
sentences.chinese: 可是超能战士使出‘佯攻’，一下便打倒烈焰马。

sentences.english: In my whole life, the only passion is I devoted myself to our hot love.
sentences.chinese: 我们烈焰的爱恋，是我此生唯一奉献的宗卷。

sentences.english: Flame Throwing doesn't affect Frostfire Bolt anymore.
sentences.chinese: “烈焰投掷”不再影响冰火球术。

sentences.english: Flamestrike is an elementalist staff skill.
sentences.chinese: 烈焰打击是元素使法杖技能。

sentences.english: It is impossible to save a life from burning and avoid the heat of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 要从烈焰中救人一命而又想避开炙热，那是不可能的。

sentences.english: The two sheets of flame clashed, soaring hundreds of feet high.
sentences.chinese: 两片火焰化作一处，腾起了几百英尺高的烈焰。
